item.title: Simply Good Foods Co 10-K
item.description: Simply Good Foods Co, which is in the Food & Kindred Products [2000] industry, SEC 10-K filing on October 21, 2022 had 35053 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: august - 427 instances may - 322 instances 2022 - 318 instances company - 313 instances products - 287 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
